name: Fuck This Collapse
description:
Click the brightly colored marbles. Arrange them to make vertical lines. Make the vertical lines fall off the screen. Listen to the nice music and sound effects. Achieve marble-centric puzzle zen.

Fuck this jam, and fuck this collapse game. Mostly because I actually wound up liking this damn game.

Approximately 18 man hours from start to finish. I don't own any of the sound or art assets in this, only the code.
